title: Mayank Lal
text:
Hello World!
I‚Äôm a data scientist and quantitative developer passionate about telling stories about businesses, economy, and nations using financial data and open source tools.
I work on quantitative risk models, integrating behavioral and macroeconomic factors into risk frameworks. My focus areas are credit risk modelling (PD/EAD/LGD), regulatory analytics (CCAR/CECL/IFRS9), climate risk stress testing and portfolio analytics.



Senior Data Scientist, EXL (2022 ‚Äì Present)
Logistic Regression, Begg and Gray, State Transition Matrix, Clustering, Decision Trees, Two-stage Hurdle Models
Data Scientist, L&T Construction (2019 ‚Äì 2021)
ARIMA, GAM, NLP, Automation
Software Engineer, Infosys Limited (2014 ‚Äì 2017)
Query Optimization, Outlier Detection, Data Processing





MBA (Finance & Analytics) ‚Äî IIM Tiruchirappalli, 2019
B.Tech (Computer Science) ‚Äî GNDEC Ludhiana, 2014





FRM - Level 2 Candidate
Quantitative Analyst in R - Data Camp
Practical Time Series Analysis - The State University of New York
Azure Data Fundamentals - Microsoft
Azure AI Fundamentals - Microsoft





Modeling: Regression, Time Series Forecasting, NLP, Machine Learning

Tools: SAS, R, Python, SQL, Bash, Linux
Cloud & Versioning: AWS, Azure, GitHub

Soft Skills: Communication, Mentoring, Storytelling with Data





Pioneer Award, EXL 2024
CITI ACE Award, CITI 2024




OSS | Economics | Public Policy | Film Making | Creative Writing | Gaming
